entry.title: sanjaydbhandari/QuickDraw: QuickDraw is a lightweight and interactive drawing tool built with React and Konva. It allows users to create, move, resize, and customize shapes like rectangles, circles, arrows, and freehand scribbles. With features like undo/redo, color selection, and export functionality, QuickDraw is perfect for sketching ideas quickly and efficiently. üöÄüé®
entry.content: QuickDraw is a lightweight and interactive drawing tool built with React and Konva. It allows users to create, move, resize, and customize shapes like rectangles, circles, arrows, and freehand scribbles. With features like undo/redo, color selection, and export functionality, QuickDraw is perfect for sketching ideas quickly and efficiently. üöÄüé®
